name: Watching Grass Grow In VR - The Game
description: A thoughtful and inspired VR game about watching grass grow during the end of the world. Rain death and destruction upon your foes with your rocket launcher as you fight to the very end to have the most glorious grass in the world.
minimum_requirements: OS: WIndows 7 SP1 Processor: Intel i5-4590 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970 / AMD 290 Storage: 150 MB available space
